#include "cfe.h"

struct  CFE_TBL_FileDef_t

Defines

#define CFE_TBL_FILEDEF(ObjName, TblName, Desc, Filename)   static CFE_TBL_FileDef_t CFE_TBL_FileDef={#ObjName, #TblName, #Desc, #Filename, sizeof(ObjName)};

Define Documentation

#define CFE_TBL_FILEDEF ( ObjName,
TblName,
Desc,
Filename   )     static CFE_TBL_FileDef_t CFE_TBL_FileDef={#ObjName, #TblName, #Desc, #Filename, sizeof(ObjName)};

The CFE_TBL_FILEDEF macro can be used to simplify the declaration of a table image when using the elf2cfetbl utility. An example of the source code and how this macro would be used is as follows: 

    #include "cfe_tbl_filedef.h"

   typedef struct
   {
       int     Int1;
       int     Int2;
       int     Int3;
       char    Char1;
   } MyTblStruct_t;

   MyTblStruct_t MyTblStruct = { 0x01020304, 0x05060708, 0x090A0B0C, 0x0D };

   CFE_TBL_FILEDEF(MyTblStruct, MyApp.TableName, Table Utility Test Table, MyTblDefault.bin )
